name: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus
description:
OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus is an casual puzzel game with cute dog images. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces.
Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

features:

  • 12 Levels
  • 4x4 frames
  • casual puzzle adventure
  • auto saving
  • simple mouse control
  • 100 steam awards
